unnormalised: The transfer window, a period of frenzied activity in the world of football, sees clubs vying for the best talent available. In India, league transfers, particularly in the Indian Super League (ISL) and I-League, are increasingly sophisticated and significant.

unnormalised: Gone are the days when transfers were solely based on word-of-mouth scouting. Clubs now employ data analytics and scouting networks spanning across India and even internationally. This allows them to identify players who fit their tactical systems and address specific weaknesses.
